teaser.row1: RAF Performance, a car specialist in Lower Saxony.
teaser.row2: We specialize in Volkswagen Group vehicles (Audi, Volkswagen, Skoda, Seat, Lamborghini, and Porsche).
teaser.row3: We offer engine repairs, bodywork, and special conversions and retrofits.
teaser.row4: Simply contact us, and we'll find a solution.
teaser.row5: Your qualified car mechanic will always find a solution.

message_input.label: Message
message_input.placeholder: Any questions you may have about our services
